Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ḥry mrw n Min K3nwr with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features and a collar that envelopes the crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of the Dead in one central column and six rows of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back of one arm is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
